EmailTemplate.subject: Lock On For Less
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Do you need guidance and control? Look no further, Honeywell's high performance Inertial Measurement Units (IMUs) meet the needs of a broad range of guidance and control applications. Our IMUs have been successfully deployed on a wide range of military weaponry, UAVs, stabilized platform, surface mapping and ground survey applications with unsurpassed performance and reliability. With a wide selection of IMU's at a low price, size, and weight to suit all your requirements with proven accuracy and dependability when you need it most. Book a meeting today to get you locked on for less.
BOOK A MEETING <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/IMU.html]]>
